summary.para: Contains architecture-specific information to use to create an enclave when the enclave type is ENCLAVE_TYPE_SGX, which specifies an enclave for the Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) architecture extension.

remarks.para: For more information about the SECS structure, see the Intel SGX Programming Reference that is available from Intel Software Guard Extensions.

summary.para: The SGX enclave control structure (SECS) to use to create the enclave.
